attributes.action: Posthumous recognition of Reginald J Mitchell, designer of the Supermarine Spitfire
attributes.additional_details:
To recognise the Genius, that was Reginald J Mitchell, designer of the Supermarine Spitfire, without which The Battle of Britian would have had a very different outcome.
I believe a posthumous should be considered, in this the 70th Anniversary of D-Day.
Thank you for you attention.
